titles.title: To provide for the conveyance of the former Department of Agriculture Agricultural Research Service laboratory in Fresno, California, to the City of Fresno.
To provide for the conveyance of the former Department of Agriculture Agricultural Research Service laboratory in Fresno, California, to the City of Fresno.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: Directs the Administrator of General Services to convey without consideration to Fresno, California, the former Department of Agriculture Agricultural Research Service laboratory in Fresno to be used for educational purposes.
